summary: Email chain between legal professionals discussing an update on the Epstein Estate, with a deadline and a request for a call to discuss a new development. The email is from Marc A. Weinstein, a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, indicating ongoing legal or administrative matters related to Epstein's estate after his death.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: Author of the initial email providing an update on the Epstein Estate and requesting a call to discuss a new development.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (Cc) in the email from Marc A. Weinstein regarding the Epstein Estate update.

connections.description: Weinstein includes Tomback as a recipient (Cc) on an email about the Epstein Estate, indicating they are both involved in related legal or administrative matters.

events.title: Epstein Estate update deadline
events.description: Deadline mentioned for an update on the Epstein Estate, with a call scheduled to discuss a new development.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 9, 2020, indicating ongoing legal or administrative activity related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate over a year after his death.
Marc A. Weinstein, a partner and chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, is involved in providing an update on the Epstein Estate.
A new development regarding the Epstein Estate is mentioned, prompting a request for a call to discuss it.
Andrew Tomback is copied on the email, suggesting his involvement in matters related to the Epstein Estate.
The email includes standard legal confidentiality disclaimers, indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.
